1130.name: Hidden Thief
1130.description: Stealing grants you stealth. Gain increased movement speed while in stealth.

facts.description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.

traited_facts.description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.

1134.name: Cloaked in Shadow
1134.description: Gaining stealth blinds nearby foes. You cannot be critically hit while stealthed.

facts.description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

1135.name: Shadow's Rejuvenation
1135.description: Regenerate health and initiative while in stealth.

1136.name: Meld with Shadows
1136.description: Stealth lasts longer when it's granted by your skills.

1160.name: Last Refuge
1160.description: Use Lesser Blinding Powder when your health reaches a certain threshold or when you take falling damage. You take less falling damage.

skills.name: Lesser Blinding Powder

facts.description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.
Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

skills.description: Deception. Blind nearby foes and grant stealth to nearby allies.

traited_facts.description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.

1162.name: Rending Shade
1162.description: Steal boons from enemies you strike with stealth attacks. Incoming damage from enemies without boons is reduced.

1284.name: Shadow's Embrace
1284.description: Remove conditions periodically while in stealth.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second. Deals additional damage to moving foes. Stacks intensity.
Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.

1293.name: Concealed Defeat
1293.description: Cast Lesser Smoke Screen when downed. <c=@abilitytype>Deception</c> skills gain reduced recharge.

skills.name: Lesser Smoke Screen

facts.description: Next outgoing attack misses; stacks duration.

skills.description: Deception. Create a smoke screen that blocks projectiles and blinds foes.

1294.name: Merciful Ambush
1294.description: Stealth yourself and your target when reviving an ally. You revive allies faster.

facts.description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.

traited_facts.description: Currently invisible. Ends if you deal damage.

1297.name: Shadow Protector
1297.description: When you grant stealth to an ally, they gain regeneration.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

1300.name: Leeching Venoms
1300.description: <c=@abilitytype>Venom</c> skills gain reduced recharge and siphon life from struck foes. <c=@reminder>Siphoning can only occur once per strike.</c>

1705.name: Resilience of Shadows
1705.description: Stealth effects that you apply reduce incoming attack damage.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

1209.name: Assassin's Fury
1209.description: Gain might when you gain fury.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

1210.name: Unrelenting Strikes
1210.description: Gain fury when you strike an enemy whose health is below the threshold.

facts.description: Critical Chance increased by 20%; stacks duration.

1215.name: Hidden Killer
1215.description: Gain bonus critical-hit chance while stealthed. This bonus lingers for a short duration after you've been revealed.

facts.description: You have increased critical hit chance.

1267.name: Signets of Power
1267.description: Signets gain reduced recharge time and an additional passive effect.

facts.description: Heal when you kill a foe.
Gain might when you kill a foe.
Restore initiative when you kill a foe.
Regain endurance when you kill a foe.
Gain stealth when you kill a foe. (No effect if already stealthed.)

1268.name: Twin Fangs
1268.description: Deal increased critical damage while your health is above the threshold. Gain bonus critical-hit chance when hitting a foe from behind or the side.

1272.name: Practiced Tolerance
1272.description: Gain ferocity based on your precision.

1281.name: Keen Observer
1281.description: Critical-hit chance is increased while your health is above the threshold.

1282.name: Ferocious Strikes
1282.description: Gain increased critical damage against foes whose health is above the threshold.

1299.name: Ankle Shots
1299.description: Critical hits with pistols and harpoon guns have a chance to cripple foes. Pistol and harpoon attacks deal increased damage to crippled foes.

facts.description: Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

1702.name: Invigorating Precision
1702.description: You are healed for a percentage of outgoing critical hit damage.

1904.name: No Quarter
1904.description: Landing a critical hit while under the effects of fury increases the duration of fury. Gain increased ferocity while under the effects of fury.

facts.description: Critical Chance increased by 20%; stacks duration.

1157.name: Lead Attacks
1157.description: Increases damage and condition damage per initiatives spent. Steal gains reduced recharge time.

facts.description: Damage and condition damage is increased.

1158.name: Sleight of Hand
1158.description: Stealing also dazes the target. Reduces the recharge of Steal.

facts.description: Unable to activate skills; stacks duration.

1159.description: Leave behind Lesser Caltrops when you dodge.
